bpmnProcessId.description: the bpmn process id of the corresponding process definition

customHeaders.description: user-defined headers associated with this job

deadline.description:
the unix timestamp until when the job is exclusively assigned to this worker (time unit
    is milliseconds since unix epoch). If the deadline is exceeded, it can happen that the job
    is handed to another worker and the work is performed twice. If this property is not set it
    will return '-1'.

elementId.description: the element id of the corresponding service task

elementInstanceKey.description: the element instance key of the corresponding service task

errorCode.description:
the error code to identify the business error. It is set by the job worker then the
    processing fails because of a non-technical error that should be handled by the process.

errorMessage.description:
the message that contains additional context of the failure/error. It is set by the job
    worker then the processing fails because of a technical failure or a non-technical error.

processDefinitionKey.description: the process key of the corresponding process definition

processDefinitionVersion.description: the version of the corresponding process definition

processInstanceKey.description: the key of the corresponding process instance

recurringTime.description:
the timestamp when this job record should be recurred. This method is used by backoff
    to determine the date when the job is needed to be recurred after backoff.

retryBackoff.description: the time of backoff in milliseconds. If backoff is disabled this method returns 0 (default value).

variables.description: the variables of this record. Can be empty.

worker.description: the assigned worker to complete the job
